Abstractor

Interface IAbstraction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CAbstraction

    public interface IAbstraction
    Interface describing a mapping from essential parse trees to abstract syntax trees.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CNode getAST()
      Gets the AST object corresponding to the ParseTree.
      CNodeFactory getNodeFactory()
      Returns a NodeFactory object responsible for creating the different kinds of abstract syntax tree nodes.
      CNode getTransformedParseTree()
      Gets the TransformedParseTree object corresponding to ParseTree .
      void setAST(CNode aAST)
      Sets the AST object after transformation of the ParseTree.
      void setNodeFactory(CNodeFactory aNodeFactory)
      Sets the NodeFactory object to be used in the creation of the different kinds of abstract syntax tree nodes.
      void setTransformedParseTree(CNode aTransformedParseTree)
      Sets the TransformedParseTree object.
      CNode transformParseTree(CNode aParseTree)
      Transforms the assigned aParseTree object by replacing all occurrences of CMultiDotNode nodes by CTupleNode nodes, and returns an instance of the TransformedParseTree .

    • Method Detail

      • getTransformedParseTree

        CNode getTransformedParseTree()
        Gets the TransformedParseTree object corresponding to ParseTree .
        Returns:
        an instance of CNode representing the TransformedParseTree.

      • setTransformedParseTree

        void setTransformedParseTree(CNode aTransformedParseTree)
        Sets the TransformedParseTree object.
        Parameters:
        aTransformedParseTree - the CNode object

      • transformParseTree

        CNode transformParseTree(CNode aParseTree)
        Transforms the assigned aParseTree object by replacing all occurrences of CMultiDotNode nodes by CTupleNode nodes, and returns an instance of the TransformedParseTree .
        Parameters:
        aParseTree - the CNode object to be transformed.
        Returns:
        an instance of CNode representing the TransformedParseTree .
        See Also:
        ECFGTreeTransformations.trMultiDotToTuple(GrammarNotions.ECFGNodes.CECFGNode)

      • setNodeFactory

        void setNodeFactory(CNodeFactory aNodeFactory)
        Sets the NodeFactory object to be used in the creation of the different kinds of abstract syntax tree nodes.
        Parameters:
        aNodeFactory - the CNodeFactory object.

      • getNodeFactory

        CNodeFactory getNodeFactory()
        Returns a NodeFactory object responsible for creating the different kinds of abstract syntax tree nodes.
        Returns:
        an instance of CNodeFactory representing the NodeFactory .

      • setAST

        void setAST(CNode aAST)
        Sets the AST object after transformation of the ParseTree.
        Parameters:
        aAST - the CNode object.

      • getAST

        CNode getAST()
        Gets the AST object corresponding to the ParseTree.
        Returns:
        an instance of CNode representing the AST.
